Woodbridge Library

Manager: Helen Scrivener

New Street, Woodbridge
IP12 1DT

Tel: 01394 446510
Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
Friends group: Friends of Woodbridge Library (FOWL)

Social media:

  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Booked Out podcast

Facilities

  • Free wifi available
  • Scanning, printing and photocopying facilities
  • Accessibility information
  • Special collections: Edward Fitzgerald collection, Seckford collection
  • Borrow an eReader from the library

Room hire

Display space

Display boards

Cost: £10 per week

Staffed table display in main library/

Cost: £10 per day

Regular events and activities

Children's events

Tot Rock: songs and action rhymes for toddlers

Wednesday, 1115-1145

TinyTalk Baby Signing: musical baby signing classes to develop your baby’s communication skills – contact Sam on 07845230624 or samh@tinytalk.co.uk

Thursday, 0930-1030

Story and Rhyme time: stories and more for pre-school

Friday, 1030-1100

Kid’s Club craft activities: for primary school age children

Sunday, 1030-1200

Baby Bounce: soothing songs and gentle nursery rhymes for babies

Wednesday, 1030-1050

Older people's events

Arts and crafts group: for older people and their carers

second Wednesday of the month, 1000-1100
